claim: Alien: Covenant is a science fiction film directed by Ridley Scott.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Sir Ridley Scott  (  born 30 November 1937  )  is an English film director and producer .

claim: Alien: Covenant is a science fiction film directed by Ridley Scott.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Following his commercial breakthrough with the science-fiction horror film Alien  (  1979  )  , his best known works are the neo-noir dystopian science fiction film Blade Runner  (  1982  )  , crime drama Thelma & Louise  (  1991  )  , historical drama and Best Picture Oscar winner Gladiator  (  2000  )  , war film Black Hawk Down  (  2001  )  , crime thriller Hannibal  (  2001  )  , biographical film American Gangster  (  2007  )  , and science fiction films Prometheus  (  2012  )  and The Martian  (  2015  )  .

claim: Alien: Covenant is a science fiction film directed by Ridley Scott.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Scott is known for his atmospheric , highly concentrated visual style .

claim: Alien: Covenant is a science fiction film directed by Ridley Scott.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Though his films range widely in setting and period , they frequently showcase memorable imagery of urban environments , whether 2nd century Rome  (  Gladiator  )  , 12th century Jerusalem  (  Kingdom of Heaven  )  , Medieval England  (  Robin Hood  )  , contemporary Mogadishu  (  Black Hawk Down  )  , or the future cityscapes of Blade Runner .

claim: Alien: Covenant is a science fiction film directed by Ridley Scott.
premise_source_doc_sentence: His films are also known for their strong female characters .

claim: Alien: Covenant is a science fiction film directed by Ridley Scott.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Scott has been nominated for three Academy Awards for Directing  (  for Thelma & Louise , Gladiator and Black Hawk Down  )  .

claim: Alien: Covenant is a science fiction film directed by Ridley Scott.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1995 , both Ridley and his brother Tony received a BAFTA for Outstanding British Contribution To Cinema .

claim: Alien: Covenant is a science fiction film directed by Ridley Scott.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2003 , Scott was knighted for his `` services to the British film industry '' .

claim: Alien: Covenant is a science fiction film directed by Ridley Scott.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In a 2004 BBC poll Scott was named the tenth most influential person in British culture .

claim: Alien: Covenant is a science fiction film directed by Ridley Scott.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2015 he received an honorary doctorate from the Royal College of Art in London .

claim: Alien: Covenant is a science fiction film directed by Ridley Scott.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Alien : Covenant is a 2017 American science fiction horror film directed by Ridley Scott and written by John Logan and Dante Harper , with a story by Michael Green and Jack Paglen .
